alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 11:56PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wheeler, eastern Gray, northern Collingsworth, southeastern Roberts, southern Hemphill and northeastern Donley Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Mobeetie to 4 miles north of Kellerville to 6 miles west of Lela to 10 miles west of Dozier. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Lutie, New Mobeetie, Twitty, Allison, Lela, Samnorwood, Kellerville, Dozier and Mobeetie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler
